import { MoreVert } from "@material-ui/icons"; import { userState } from "react"; import "./post.css"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; function Post({ post }) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like); return (
user.id === post.userId)[0] .profilePicture } alt="" /> {Users.filter((user) => user.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people liked it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
